title: krpoltext: Korean Political Text Corpora for R
description: R package providing programmatic access to two large-scale Korean political text corpora: (1) South Korean Election Campaign Booklets covering 49,678 candidates across presidential, National Assembly, and local elections (2000-2022), and (2) South Korean Party Statements containing 82,723 official statements from the two major parties (2003-2022). Includes a static JSON API for language-agnostic dataset discovery. Data is hosted on OSF and automatically downloaded on first use.
